analysis.description:
Reentrancy in LogoVote.claimWinner (/unique_chucks/17/0x3ab1d534bb477f516817efaaf0b569f419b8e292.sol#293-299):
	External calls:
	- vote.balanceOf(logos[i]) > vote.balanceOf(winner) (/unique_chucks/17/0x3ab1d534bb477f516817efaaf0b569f419b8e292.sol#295-299)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- winner (/unique_chucks/17/0x3ab1d534bb477f516817efaaf0b569f419b8e292.sol#298-299)

Vote.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/17/0x3ab1d534bb477f516817efaaf0b569f419b8e292.sol#77-78) shadows:
	- ERC20.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/17/0x3ab1d534bb477f516817efaaf0b569f419b8e292.sol#4-5)

LogoVote.claimWinner has external calls inside a loop:
	- vote.balanceOf(logos[i]) > vote.balanceOf(winner) (/unique_chucks/17/0x3ab1d534bb477f516817efaaf0b569f419b8e292.sol#295-299)

Reentrancy in LogoVote.donate (/unique_chucks/17/0x3ab1d534bb477f516817efaaf0b569f419b8e292.sol#303-318):
	External calls:
	- ! vote.transfer(beneficiary,voteToSend) (/unique_chucks/17/0x3ab1d534bb477f516817efaaf0b569f419b8e292.sol#309-311)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- backers (/unique_chucks/17/0x3ab1d534bb477f516817efaaf0b569f419b8e292.sol#311-314)
	- totalReward (/unique_chucks/17/0x3ab1d534bb477f516817efaaf0b569f419b8e292.sol#314-317)
ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0x3ab1d534bb477f516817efaaf0b569f419b8e292.sol#4-5)
